manifest_extensionDescription.message: Kotnet Login is a browser extension that provides automatic login for websites of the KULeuven such as Kotnet, Toledo...

badgeText_inactive.description: Text to show on the icon when the extension is inactive

error_noUsername.description: Errormessage shown when no username is set
error_noUsername.message: Please enter your KULeuven Association credentials in the extension settings. Then refresh this page to login automatically.

error_loginFailed.message: The Kotnet Login Extension failed to login. Have you changed your password recently? Then update the extensions options please.

options_loginData_explanation.description: An explanation shown below the subtitle
options_loginData_explanation.message: Fill in your username (ex. s1234567) and password.

options_succes.description: Message shown when options saved succesfully
options_succes.message: The options were saved succesfully and will be used from now on. You may close this tab.
